ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Highpass Keep
ygData.msgSnippet: Just wanted to add a couple of things.. And reiterate what Sylly said about chasing down the fleeing mobs... BE SURE LARGOS (or DDD .. or COD) is OFF!!!!  I
ygData.messageBody:
Just wanted to add a couple of things.. And reiterate
what Sylly said about chasing down the fleeing mobs...
BE SURE LARGOS (or DDD .. or COD) is OFF!!!! I dont
know how many deaths ive had to that bit of
foolishness on my part. The other thing is that since
the lowered agro of our songs, I can use all
instrument attack (hymn, cod, ddd) in there just fine
with out a healer. I use the instruments then for
maximum hymn benefits, and as long as I have my
mandolin out, I can also feel useful with CoD, and
DDD.

Ive spent many hours in there with no healer and it
can be done. The only bad combination Ive seen is 3
bards, and no other melee.

I love HK, because, as you said no long corpse
retrieval runs, relatively safe, and really good xp.
The downside is that if you get on in prime time (on
bristlebane anyway) expect to wait at least an hour
and often two for a group. One saturday night, I got
a tell five (yes 5) hours later saying my name was up.
Needless to say, I had found a group at aviaks by
then.

--- Elijah Meeker <elijah@...> wrote:
> Thanks a LOT! As I never know where in Anitonica I
> am going to be fighting I
> usually always stay bound in Highpass Keep and just
> make the run if I die.
> It will be nice to have that run just be
> downstairs...
>
> :o)
>
> Tszaaz E'Taurguin


=====
Harmonie Moonsong 28th Composition in Progress High Keep, Norrath, Bristlebane server http://www.geocities.com/harmoniemoonsong
